name: Fulminator
flavorText: The Quinblades are the only surviving weapons forged by master swordsmith Morad Peerse, each a unique expression of his craft. Made during Peerse's Early Period, Fulminator expresses, through blinding speed and arcing lightning strikes, its maker's youthful exuberance and the joy he found in his craft.
flavorTextHtml: The Quinblades are the only surviving weapons forged by master swordsmith Morad Peerse, each a unique expression of his craft. Made during Peerse's Early Period, Fulminator expresses, through blinding speed and arcing lightning strikes, its maker's youthful exuberance and the joy he found in his craft.

secondary.textHtml: Lightning damage has a chance to turn enemies into lightning rods, causing them to pulse 472% weapon damage as Lightning every second to nearby enemies for 6 seconds. [444 - 555]%
